desc: Great boost to BC, HC, Zel and Karma drop rate when attacking

dictionary.lore: Priests taught that through had work and dedication even commoners could amass fortune and riches. On the other hand, most commoners believed that the rich came by even more fortune much too easily. Proof of that may lay with this cap, said to effortlessly bring its owner more possessions and money when worn. However, no records are left as to how to obtain it, leaving many to discard it as nothing more than a slacker's fantasy.

name: Fortune Cap
